title: How it feels having a bro code(peaceful farming, no pokes/ganks, etc.) at Top lane

replies.body: I had two Nasi do this a while back.  Unfortunately our Nasus did not prioritize CDR, so he only had about 850 stacks when the enemy had 1k.  We lost.  Pretty funny though, the enemy jungler and I even held to our end and didn't gank them the entire game.

"Nasi"
{{champion:75}} "Well Nasus, what should we call each other?"
{{champion:75}} "I don't know, Nasus, what do you call two of the same thing?"
{{champion:75}} "How about our name, but pluralized!"
{{champion:75}} "How would you pluralize 'Nasus?"
{{champion:75}} "A good question, Nasus. Hmm..."
{{champion:75}} "I've got it! Our names end in 'us,' so they must be nouns of the second declension in Latin! Which means, of course, that to pluralize them, we only have to change the 'us' to an 'i."
{{champion:75}} "By golly you're right! Now I know why we spent so long studying in the Shuriman library!"
Or you could call them Susans.
Or Nasodes
I approve.
Aw shucks, you guys are too good to me!
Nah, bro. Sion ain't got no bros. He's got a harem. But no bros.
I think he's a tad too blood thirsty, undead, and insane to justify Swain giving him a harem.
Sion doesn't need anyone to "give" him anything. Sion takes what he pleases, and everyone else just has to deal with it.

> [{quoted}](name=Glory ln Death,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=b8mrFbtF,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2017-04-11T16:24:24.558+0000)
>
> Mundo takes what he pleases

Fixed, yw.
Swain is still his general, and I think Sions lobito died after he sacrificed himself killing that Jarvan scrub.
Sion does not recognize Swain as his leader. Swain lacks the strength necessary to earn Sion's respect and allegiance.

Actually *galvin*, Noxians respect strength in all its forms and Swain has a will of Iron and a sharp intellect. Sion respects him as a general because of this and even resists the temptation to kill Swain's bird....thing because of it.

Sion's taunt to Swain: https://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/6/61/Sion.tauntSwain03.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20140927044639

"You are weak, Swain! You are no leader!"

Also: "You are not my general!"

Sion does not respect Swain.

> [{quoted}](name=Glory ln Death,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=b8mrFbtF,comment-id=0001000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-04-11T17:17:07.418+0000)
>
> Sion's taunt to Swain: https://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/6/61/Sion.tauntSwain03.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20140927044639
> 
> "You are weak, Swain! You are no leader!"
> 
> Also: "You are not my general!"
> 
> Sion does not respect Swain.

"The men stare. There's fear in their eyes. If they're afraid to look upon victory, I should pluck those craven eyes out. There is no fear in the Grand General's eyes, only approval. He is pleased with this conquest.

Walking the field with the Grand General, surveying the carnage, I ache for another foe. He is hobbled, a leg wound from the battle? If it pains him, he does not show it. A true Noxian. I do not like his pet, though; it picks over the dead, having earned nothing. His war hounds were more fitting company."

Taunts aren't considered as cannon as the lore. It's more for the summoners benefit then adding lore.
Gonna have to agree with this.  The rift and the interactions on it are not Cannon.  Some of them line up with cannon events, but the Rift itself no longer exists so far as we know in Runeterra.
This makes me relate Sion to The Mountain from GoT even more.

> [{quoted}](name=Glory ln Death,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=b8mrFbtF,comment-id=0001000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-04-11T17:17:07.418+0000)
> 
>  "You are not my general!"
> 

God if that doesn't sound familiar.

> [{quoted}](name=Chicken Dynasty,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=b8mrFbtF,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-04-11T14:19:48.251+0000)
>
> Top Lane:
> {{champion:164}} {{champion:420}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:92}} 
> 
> That harem is a lot of salt and sugar!

As if he would approve of Demacians.
Get that Riven crap out of my harem!
Just make out already! Sheesh..

And the carry mains don't understand why we don't mind playing champions who take forever to kill eachother.

It's because we _don't_ kill eachother.

Meanwhile

{{champion:75}} Hey.. "bro"....

{{champion:266}}  Oh god please no.

I had a game like this recently. I was top against a Malphite, and I was Nasus. He called for a bro lane, and who am I to disagree? We decided to proxy eachother's waves to get the maximum CS. One time, their Draven ADC came top lane to interfere with my farming. My first Q did 80% of his HP. He did not survive my second Q.
And that's why you can't bro lane against a Nasus.
http://i.imgur.com/bofUVay.gif?noredirect
{{item:3070}} {{champion:2}} {{item:3070}} "[sniff] Brroooooooooooo. . ."
To love these matches they're the best.
